column4: hello! i have my laptop running from the mains... but when my battery gets charged fully like now... the screen starts to flash in ubuntu and the whole system slows down as a result
is there a way to stop the flashing screen???
nickrud.. i believe the flashing has a purpose... it informs me that the battery is fully charged and i'm running from aus] xillary power
